sentences.en: All this accentuates the Russian sense of having come under a kind of colonial tutelage.
sentences.cn: 所有这一切,使俄国更痛切地觉得自己已置身于某种殖民托管之下.

sentences.en: Far from resenting such tutelage, I am only too glad to avail myself of it.
sentences.cn: 我决不憎恨这种教育,相反, 我十分高兴对它加以利用.

sentences.en: He made good progress under her tutelage.
sentences.cn: 他在她的教导下进步很大.

sentences.en: I am extremely interested in investment banking and would love nothing more than to learn under your tutelage.
sentences.cn: 我异常地向往在顶级投行工作的机会，我唯一的要求就是能够在您的指导下学习更多的东西。

sentences.en: I gained valuable training under his tutelage.
sentences.cn: 在他的守护下,我得到有价值的训练.

sentences.en: Then enhances own tutelage once more!
sentences.cn: 进而再次提高自身的修养!

sentences.en: Today, under Flanagan's tutelage , she is very much a winner.
sentences.cn: 今天, 在弗拉纳根的指导下, 她是个十足的成功者.

words.tran_cn: 辅导的；家庭教师的，个别指导的
当家庭教师；（美）在家庭教师指导下学习

trans.tran_cn: 保护，受监护，指导，（对外国领土的）托管
trans.tran_en: when you are taught or looked after by someone
